I'm wanting to get the Vray 2 for 3ds max (64) but ive been leeching for like 6 hours lol and nothing. hmmm.

Hey So I put all the files in the right places but when I choose the renderer in the render settings I choose vray 2 but when I go and click "render", It says,"cannot obtain licence." Help please!
thanks

lalawawa....

This would usually indicate you missed a folder.... Perhaps you didnt copy & replace who knows?

Try again as per the instructions and if it still fails  reinstall & follow these installation instructions from sober11:

"1. Installation Type : Workstation
 2. Make sure your 3D Max directories are correct as shown in the default installation.
 3. Select local V-ray license server on this machine & check Register V-ray menus
 4. Uncheck Install WIBU key drivers, keep uncheck also Register the V-ray License Server (this works for me). Check this in your next re-install if it doesn't work for you."

I dont think step 4 is critical.
